name: Lost Child REMAKE
description:
REMAKE YAYYY!!!

!!!PLEASE READ THE DOWNLOAD INSRTUCTIONS!!!

Lost Child is a game where you play as a child named Ethan, who goes on a quest for a different life then the one he lives in now

this is me and my friend's first ever game. we accept criticism but not hate.  enjoy! also if you play our game feel free to say so in the comments :D
